29b3('bum): lags pa de ni/ sred pa sa lags te/ de ltar na/ sred pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
29b4('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma/ lags te/ de'i slad du sred pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa/
29b5('bum): de sred pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das lend pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ le nad pa ma lags te de ltar na le nad pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te
29b6('bum): gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te
29b7('bum): de'i slad du lend pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de le nad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni srid pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sred pa dang
29b8('bum): grib pa do gnyis sum mtshas te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slang du zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de'i 'di ltar 'grib pa'i gcigs lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba
30a1('bum): lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du srid pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ srid pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das skye ba'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ skye
30a2('bum): ba ma lags te/ de ltar na skye ba dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig
30a3('bum): ma lags gnyis ma la gos mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du skye ba'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de skye ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rga shi'i 'grib
30a4('bum): bgang lags pa de ni/ rgazhi'i ma lags te/ de ltaranarga shi dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhen/
30a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rko shi'i 'grib pa gang lags
30a6('bum): ba de/ rga shi ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
30a7('bum): pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags
30a8('bum): mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims
30b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags te/ de ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/
30b2('bum): gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i
30b3('bum): slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pre grang lags pa de ni
30b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags te/ de ltar na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//
30b5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib ba ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du bzod pa'i
30b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni
30b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags te/ de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci
30b8('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rolapa
31a1('bum): tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags
31a2('bum): pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags te/ de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//
31a3('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du bsam
31a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
31a5('bum): po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/
31a6('bum): gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma
31a7('bum): lags te/ de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa
31a8('bum): gang lags pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad
31b1('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa
31b2('bum): gang lags pa de/ nang stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid dang /
31b3('bum): 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dri ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba
31b4('bum): ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ phyi stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa
31b5('bum): nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma
31b6('bum): mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i skad
31b7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ phyi rang stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa
31b8('bum): nyin ma lags te/ de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa
32a1('bum): mi gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma
32a2('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/
32a3('bum): gnyis su bgyi ma mchis so// de ci'i slad duzhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa'i gcig sa lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slang du
32a4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ chen po stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni don dam pa stong pa
32a5('bum): nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
32a6('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar/ 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de
32a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
32a8('bum): 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma
32b1('bum): lags/ ba dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid kyi
32b2('bum): 'khrig 'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid pa lags/ de ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis sus mchis te/ gnyis su bgyi ma mchis so// de ci
32b3('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
32b4('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/
32b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de/ ra na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa/ de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis
32b6('bum): de ci'i mdu rgyu na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig mya lags/ gnyis ma lags/ song pa ma lags/ ba dad pa la sngags te/ de'i thang du
32b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das sogs dang pas myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'amatha ba
32b8('bum): lags pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bkyer ma mchis so//
33a1('bum): rdo ci'i slang du len/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig sa lags/ gnyis ma 'grus/ mang ba ma lags/ bdad pa sa sngags te/ de'i srad du
33a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang
33a3('bum): lags pa de ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dor ba myed pa stong po nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir mchis so// de ci'i
33a4('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib/ ba na/ gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du
33a5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags
33a6('bum): ba de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
33a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags mang ba sa lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa
33a8('bum): gang lags pa de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar
33b1('bum): na chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
33b2('bum): lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma lag
33b3('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
33b4('bum): 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyi ra ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags
33b5('bum): gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa/ nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ rang gi mtshan nyid
33b6('bum): stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na myi dmyigs
33b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
33b8('bum): lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
34a1('bum): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa
34a2('bum): nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags
34a3('bum): gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma lags so//
34a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa ga nga lags pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lanyis te/ de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis
34a5('bum): su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltara'agrib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ ma
34a6('bum): ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dngos po
34a7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
34a8('bum): 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ mang ma
34b1('bum): lags/ ba dad pa la lags te/ de'i slad dung ngos pa myed pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'khrib pa gang lags pa de/ dngos pa myed pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'a
34b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis
34b3('bum): teganyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma
34b4('bum): lags te/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong
34b5('bum): pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na yang da ga par spong ba rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma
34b6('bum): mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa'i gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad
34b7('bum): pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib
34b8('bum): pa gang lags pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//
35a1('bum): de ci'i slad du zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ bdad pa sa lags te/ de'i slad du rngu 'phrul
35a2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po rnams ma lags te/ de ltar
35a3('bum): na dbang po rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags
35a4('bum): gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa ga nga lags pa de dbang po rnams ma lags so//
35a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ ni stobs rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na stobs na/ mas dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te
35a6('bum): gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags
35a7('bum): te de'i slad du stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de stobs rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni
35a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i
35b1('bum): smad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag nas/
35b2('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i
35b3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyi su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du
35b4('bum): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad
35b5('bum): du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang la gas pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags
35b6('bum): pa'i 'baden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma
35b7('bum): mchis / de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i
35b8('bum): slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/
36a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na bsam gtan rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na
36a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang
36a3('bum): lags pa de/ bsam gtan rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chad myed pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni tshad myed pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na tshad myed pa
36a4('bum): rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags
36a5('bum): gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du chad myed pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ tshad myed pa rnams ma lags so//
36a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags te/ de sbyar na gzugs sbed pa'i
36a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig sa
36a8('bum): lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de gzugs myed pa'i/
36b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par thar/
36b2('bum): pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags
36b3('bum): gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par ldad pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ rnam par thard pa rnams ma lags so//
36b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma
36b5('bum): lags te/ de ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa'i ste mas par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis sa su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//
36b6('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du mthar
36b7('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par
36b8('bum): ad pA'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
37a1('bum): smond pa myed pa ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/
37a2('bum): gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang pa ma lags/ tha dad pa ma
37a3('bum): lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
37a4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma lag/ sa so// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ mngon par shes
37a5('bum): pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
37a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa
37a7('bum): gang lags pa de/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzind rnams ma lags te/ de ltar
37a8('bum): na ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
37b1('bum): lags gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ting nge 'dzind rnams ma lags so//
37b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma
37b3('bum): mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags
37b4('bum): tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
37b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
37b6('bum): rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags
37b7('bum): gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la
37b8('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni myi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags pa de/ de ltar na myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / 'grib pa
38a1('bum): de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyi ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis sa
38a2('bum): lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ myi 'jigs pa rnams pa lags so// bcom ldan
38a3('bum): 'dam pa sa yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de'i so ma yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na mo so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / 'grib 'i
38a4('bum): nyis sum gnyis su bgyid/ ma mchis so// de ba'i slad du zhe na/ bcom lda'adas de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig sa lags/
38a5('bum): ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'bru ba pa gang lags pa de/ so so yang dag par rig pa
38a6('bum): rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni byams pa chen po ma lags te/ de ltar na byams pa chen po dang / 'grib pa de gnyis
38a7('bum): su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis mA lags mang ba ma lags/
38a8('bum): tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ byams pa chen po ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni
38b1('bum): snying rje chen po ma lags te/ de ltar na snying rje chen po dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di
38b2('bum): ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ snying rje chen po ma lags so//
38b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lagru ba de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
38b4('bum): rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma
38b5('bum): lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma/ 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ sangs
38b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na thos
38b7('bum): cad shes pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags
38b8('bum): gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma lags so// bcom
39a1('bum): ldan 'das las kyinas pashes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa den/ las kyinas bshes pa nying sa lags te/ de skar rnams kyin pa mags pa nyid dang / par
39a2('bum): gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni/ gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba sa sa
39a3('bum): bad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rnam phra mams cad mkhyen
39a4('bum): pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam pa sa cad mkhyend pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pathams cad mkhyend po nyid dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su
39a5('bum): ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'gro/ ba ba ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags/ mang
39a6('bum): ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma lags so//
39a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das ka
39b1('bum): yang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i
39b2('bum): chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang 'du shes shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang 'du byed ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma
39b3('bum): mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
39b4('bum): gang myig ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rna ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
39b5('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sA zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
39b6('bum): gang lce zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangasu bgyis pa'o// gang lus shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi
39b7('bum): grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su mchis pa'o// gang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su
39b8('bum): ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sgra zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/
40a1('bum): gang d+hI zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang ro zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis sul mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchim
40a2('bum): pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang reg ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang chos shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis sum
40a3('bum): mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su
40a4('bum): bgyis pa'o// gang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes pa gyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma ma chis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sna'i
40a5('bum): rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shang nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su
40a6('bum): ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su
40a7('bum): bgyis pa'o// gang yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o zhes bgyi ba
40a8('bum): 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi
40b1('bum): grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i zhes bkyi
40b2('bum): ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos
40b3('bum): kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang myig gi 'dus te reg po'i
40b4('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba
40b5('bum): 'di ni gnyis ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sna'i 'dus te re/ ka pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis
40b6('bum): shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs
40b7('bum): mu bgyis pa'o// gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yid kyi 'dus te
40b8('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sa'i khams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
41a1('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang chu'i khams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
41a2('bum): gang mye'i khams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyas pa sa mchis pa'i ros kyi grangs su bgyis pa/ gang rlung gi las shes bgyi ba 'di mi gnyis su la ma'i ma zhing nyas pa sa mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ gang dam sa la'i khams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma bcis shig /
41a3('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
41a4('bum): gang mo rig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shinganyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang 'du byed ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su
41a5('bum): ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rnam par shes pa zhe// sa bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa
41a6('bum): ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang myang dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
41a7('bum): gang skye mched drug ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
41a8('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sred pa zhes
41b1('bum): bkyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang len du pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam tha ma mchis pa'i chos kyi smras/
41b2('bum): su bgyis pa'o// gang srid pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang skye ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
41b3('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rga shi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
41b4('bum): pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni
41b5('bum): gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa
41b6('bum): ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
41b7('bum): gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni
41b8('bum): gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis
42a1('bum): pa'o// gang phyi stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma
42a2('bum): mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
42a3('bum): gang chen po stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ gnyis su ma mchis shing/ nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
42a4('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// kA 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shIng nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis
42a5('bum): pa'o// gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang mtha' las 'das pa
42a6('bum): stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ gnyis su ma
42a7('bum): mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su
42a8('bum): bgyis pa'o// gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba
42b1('bum): 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i
42b2('bum): chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang dngos po
42b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'dini gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa la mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
42b4('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di doni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i
42b5('bum): chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
42b6('bum): gang yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis
42b7('bum): su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang dbang po rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis
42b8('bum): pa'o// gang stobs rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni
43a1('bum): gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa
43a2('bum): ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
43a3('bum): gang bsam gtan rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang tshad myed pa rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
43a4('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams shes bgyi pa 'di ni/ gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis/
43a5('bum): pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rnam par tha rad pa rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
43a6('bum): gang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rnam par thard pa'i sgo
43a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma byed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang mngon par shes
43a8('bum): pa rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang ting nge 'dzind rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam
43b1('bum): pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang
43b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang myi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni
43b3('bum): gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pal
43b4('bum): chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang byams pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang
43b5('bum): snying rje chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bgyi
43b6('bum): ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang thams cad shes pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i
43b7('bum): chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rnam pa thos
43b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// /
44a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las// le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
44a2('bum): la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar yongs su tog
44a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ gang yongs su brtag pa ni gang de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa
44a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dra nga ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu klang 'di skad du/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni gang gi phyir/ sems can
44a5('bum): byang chub yin pa de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sa bya'o// byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par chags pa myed
44a6('bum): do/ chos gang gi rnam pa shes zhe na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon pa mchags pa myed do// tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// 'du shes
44a7('bum): kye rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// 'du byed kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par
44a8('bum): chags pa myed do// myig gi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// sna'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags
44b1('bum): pa myed do// lce'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// lus kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// yid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do//
44b2('bum): gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// sgra'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// dri'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rol
44b3('bum): rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// reg gi rnam pa shes pa te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// chos kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do//
44b4('bum): phyag gi rnam par shes pa rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon pa ra chags pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa she sa te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// sna'i rnam
44b5('bum): par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par
44b6('bum): shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed du/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon pa chags pa skyed do// sdig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pashes te/
44b7('bum): de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed
44b8('bum): ro/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa byed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa zhes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te men tsa
45a1('bum): rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
45a2('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg
45a3('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg
45a4('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par gas pa myed do// sa'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// chu'i khams kyi rnam
45a5('bum): pa shes te/ de'i la mngon par chags pa myed do// mye'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa mye da do// rlung gi khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon
45a6('bum): par chags pa myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// ma
45a7('bum): rig pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// 'du byed kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par
45a8('bum): chags pa myed do// mying dang gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// skye mched drug gi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// reg pa'i rnam pa shes te
45b1('bum): de la mngon par chags pa myed do// tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon pa chags pa myed do// sbed pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// lend pa'i rnam pa shes te/
45b2('bum): de la mngon par chags pa byed do// srid pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// skye ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// ma shi'i rnam pa shes te
45b3('bum): de la mngon par chags pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par
45b4('bum): chags pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i rnam pa shes te/
45b5('bum): de la mngon par chags pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi rol tu phyind pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon parags pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
45b6('bum): pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon
45b7('bum): par chags pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// chen po stong
45b8('bum): pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/
46a1('bum): de la mngon par chags pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa zhes te/ la
46a2('bum): mngon par chags pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed
46a3('bum): do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
46a4('bum): pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mdo dan par chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
46a5('bum): kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon pa/ ra chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
46a6('bum): pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rnam
46a7('bum): pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// dbang po rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par
46a8('bum): chags pa myed do// stobs rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// 'phags
46b1('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// bsam gtan/
46b2('bum): rnams kyi rnas pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// chad myed pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
46b3('bum): kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rnam par tha dad pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
46b4('bum): dgu'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// rnam par thad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed/ pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la
46b5('bum): mngon par chags pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon
46b6('bum): par chags pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa
46b7('bum): myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do//
46b8('bum): byams pa chen po'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// snying rje chen po'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
47a1('bum): rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
47a2('bum): ti'i bu rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams rnam pa yod par bya ba ste/ 'di ltar 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gzugs sam/ sgra 'am dri 'am
47a3('bum): ro'am reg gam/ phyi nang gi chos kyang shes te/ rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis rnam pa yod par bya ba 'di dag ni/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan
47a4('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/ shes rab kyi phra rol tu phyind pa gang zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu kAng la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
47a5('bum): zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/ de ci'i phyir ring du song ba zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phung po rnams las ring du song ba sa na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// khams
47a6('bum): rnams las ring du song bas ma/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// skye mched rnams las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad las ring du song bas
47a7('bum): nade'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// 'gro ba drug las ring du song bas na de'i phyir ring du song ba/

53a8('bum): par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ na ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go// na ba'i rnam

53b2('bum): shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ sna'i rnam par shes
53b3('bum): pra bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ sna'i rnam par
53b4('bum): shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi stug ces bya bar mangs su myi tig go/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhesabya ba dang/ spyi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go//
53b5('bum): gA nas par shes po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ sAn rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / sno
53b6('bum): pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog ke/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / gyi dben zhes bya
53b7('bum): yongs su kyi thog k+Sho/ kwa'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / kyai rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// sde'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngas zhes bya
53b8('bum): kyi hog so// kyi'irnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdan kyad ces bya bar sangs su nag/ gro'adas pa shes btsun cem tha bya ma nan
54a1('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go// lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi
54a2('bum): rtog go// lce'i rnam par shes pa smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// lce'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go//
54a3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lus kyi rnam
54a4('bum): par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdagaces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/
54a5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa/ stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi
54a6('bum): tog go/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma skyed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ sus kyi rnam par shes pa smonod pa yod ces bya ba dang / smod pa myed ces
54a7('bum): bya bar 'angs su kyi rton / rdzas kyi rnam par shes pa'i zhes bya ba dang / ma 'i zhes bya bar yongs su kyi rtog / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mye dper zhes bya ba yongs su
54a8('bum): myi tog go// yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/
54b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes
54b2('bum): pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rtsi stong zhes bya bar yongs su gyi rtog go// yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// yid kyi rnam par shes/
54b3('bum): pa smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes
54b4('bum): pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su/ myi rtog go/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go//

54b6('bum): yongs su myi tog go/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa sreg ces bya ba dang / kyi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mye stong zhes bya bar yongs su

56a1('bum): sa rgya ba dang / nas skyed ces byapa yongs su rtog/ sa kyi 'dus terig pa ston pa sa ces bya ba dang / smonod pa myed ces bya bar yongs su kyimags

59a5('bum): sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mya rtog go/ rlung gi khams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rlung gi khams mtshan

59a7('bum): ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rlung gi khams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces/
59a8('bum): bya bar yongs su myi tog go// nam mkha' khams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su kyi
59b1('bum): rtog go// nam mkha'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// nam mkha'i/
59b2('bum): khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ nam mkha'i khams smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/

59b4('bum): khams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs/ su myi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/
59b5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rjes la ces bya ba dang / bdag myedas bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa'i lam sa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi

60a1('bum): ma rig pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ ma rig pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ ma rig pa sdug ces

65a7('bum): myi tog go// gyi stong pa nyid smonang pa sod ces bya ba dang / spyod pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid 'i zhes bya bu dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog ko/
65a8('bum): kyi mongs nyid me shes bya ba dang / phyi ben zhes bya ba yom sasu myigag go// byi dang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtsi tag ces bya bar yongs su kyi ton go/ byi dang nga pa nyid bden
65b1('bum): ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar/
65b2('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar
65b3('bum): yongs su myi rtog go// phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs
65b4('bum): su myi rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ stong pa nyid da stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar
65b5('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog/ go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang /
65b6('bum): bdag sbed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang /
65b7('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya
65b8('bum): pa dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba
66a1('bum): dang / rtsi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// chen po stong pa nyid cag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bu dang
66a2('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su skye tog go/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug
66a3('bum): ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go// chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar
66a4('bum): yongs su myi tog go/ chen po stong pa nyid smond pa yodaces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi
66a5('bum): zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyid da/ be na zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba
66a6('bum): dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mye tog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya
66a7('bum): ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang /
66a8('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya
66b1('bum): ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben
66b2('bum): zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
66b3('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs
66b4('bum): su myi rtog go// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ 'dus byas s+ho// po nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan myed ces bya
66b5('bum): bar yongs su myi tog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid spron pa/ yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su/ myi rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang
66b6('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dpon zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mye rtag ces
66b7('bum): bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar
66b8('bum): yongs su myi teg go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su
67a1('bum): myi rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon
67a2('bum): pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya
67a3('bum): bar yongs su myi rtog go// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes
67a4('bum): bya bar yongs su myi tog go// mtha' las 'das pa stong panyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug ces
67a5('bum): bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ mtha' las
67a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smonang pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar
67a7('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes
67a8('bum): bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
67b1('bum): zhes bya bar yongs su myi toka ko/ ka ma dang tha ma myed pa prad+maka ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog ko/ pog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces
67b2('bum): bya bar yongs su kyi rtog ko/ sogs dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid steng zhes bya ba dang / kyi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /
67b3('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog ko/ thog ma dang ma ma myed pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog ko/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
67b4('bum): pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / mA ni zhes bya bar yongs su kyi tog ko/ thog mA dang tha mu myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhe/ sa bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog
67b5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mr-i rtag tus bya bar yongs su kyi tog go/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
67b6('bum): yongs su myi tog go/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs/
67b7('bum): su kyi teg go/ dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces
67b8('bum): bya bar yongs su myi nyes so/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yon pa yid ces bya ba dang / smon pa byed ces bya bar yongs su kyi rtog go// dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid ni zhes
68a1('bum): bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog ko/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag
68a2('bum): ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces

68a5('bum): yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rang bzhin stong
68a6('bum): pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mye dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ chos thams cad stong
68a7('bum): pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su kye tog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag sred ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ chos thams
68a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid steng zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog ko/ chos thams
68b1('bum): cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su

68b3('bum): go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi tog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog
68b4('bum): ko/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / rmyi
68b5('bum): sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya/ bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
68b6('bum): pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su mye tog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs
68b7('bum): su myi tog kro/ rang gi mAtshan nyid stong pa nyid hrI zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya ba
68b8('bum): yongs su myi tog go/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / kyi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ gyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bskam
69a1('bum): zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ myi dmyigs pa spyong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug ces byab/
69a2('bum): dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ myi dbyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod

69a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar song sa su gyi tog go/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben no/ sa bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/

69b7('bum): nyid 'dre zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba yongs su myi tog go// dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ dngos po myed pa'i
69b8('bum): rab nyid song ba nyid mug ces bya ba dang / kyi mug ces bya bar yongs su su chen no/ daram pa gyid mamab nyid stong pa nyid mang zhes byab bya ba sa sa kyi togs/
70a1('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon

70a3('bum): bya ba dang / myi dber zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde
70a4('bum): zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog ko/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/
70a5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / rmyi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ dran pa nye bar ga/ zhag pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes
70a6('bum): bya bar yongasasu kyi rgyun pa nye bar gdag pa nasapa yod stes zla ba dang / ras myed ces bya bar 'dus pa kyi rtog go// dran pa nye bde gzhag pa 'ams 'ad pa
70a7('bum): byab mas bya bar yongasas kyi k+She/ drang banye bar gzhas parnams zhes bya ba dang / 'i zhes bya bar yongs su phyi rtog/ rnan pa gzhun pa rnams ca
70a8('bum): bya ba dang / myi dper zhes bya bar yongs su gyi tog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / byi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams le
70b1('bum): zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog ko/ yang dag par spong ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go// yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug

70b3('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/
70b4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ yang dag par spyong pa rnam sa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs

70b6('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog gi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug ces bya ba
70b7('bum): kyi lhag rjes bya bar yongs su kyi k+Sha k+ke/ rtse phru kyi gang pa rnams stong zhes bya ba da/ kyi gang zhes zla bar yongs su myinag so// chu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshan pa yod ces bya ba dang
70b8('bum): ma ni ma myed ces bya bar yongs su kyi tog gi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stonod pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su gyi tog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'o zhes bya
71a1('bum): pa dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dbang po rnams rtag ces bya
71a2('bum): ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dbang po rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ dbang po rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces
71a3('bum): bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ dbang po rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go//
71a4('bum): dbang po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ dbang po rnams smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar
71a5('bum): yongs su myi rtog go// dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / mo zhe zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ dbang po rnams/ dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su

71a7('bum): bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog kro/ stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong
71a8('bum): zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// stobs rnams smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces
71b1('bum): bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// stobs rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ stobs rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byang /
71b2('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/
71b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/
71b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mnam yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs
71b5('bum): su myi rtog go// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog/ go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang
71b6('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba
71b7('bum): dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// 'phags pa'i lam
71b8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su gyi tog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi
72a1('bum): rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba

72a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bde na ba rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes

72b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ bsam gtan
