77b1('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang /
77b2('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya
77b3('bum): ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa
77b4('bum): shes pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa mye da ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar
77b5('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs/ su myi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
77b6('bum): nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/
77b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs
77b8('bum): su myi tog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed
78a1('bum): ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba dang / smond pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
78a2('bum): pa nyid 'i zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog kro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi tog go// 'di lta ste
78a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ chos 'di dag la de ltar yongs su rtog go//
78a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po lnga pa'o// // smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord
78a5('bum): ci'i phyir de skad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
78a6('bum): 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa
78a7('bum): rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ myig gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin/ rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin/ sna'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin
78b1('bum): lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin/ yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ci'i phyir na
78b2('bum): de skad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin/ dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin/ ro'i ma skyes pa gang yin/
78b3('bum): pa de ni ro ma yin/ reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin/ chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin/ zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ci'i phyir na de skad du myag gi
78b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ga gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes
78b5('bum): phra ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa/ gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i sgra skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
78b6('bum): skye'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid
78b7('bum): kyi nas pa ma shes pa sna yin zhes byer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir nA de skad du/ byig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa deni/ myig gi 'dus ci reg pa ma yin/ nama'i
78b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyis pa gang yin pa de ni/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa kung yin pa de ni la na
79a1('bum): pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
79a2('bum): pa' ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
79a3('bum): pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i
79a4('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
79a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang
79a6('bum): kyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ci'i
79a7('bum): phyir na de skang du/ sa'i khams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nu'i khams ma yin/ mye'i khams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de
79a8('bum): ni kye'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de'i nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par
79b1('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin ba de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ci'i phyir na de skad du/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang
79b2('bum): yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ mying dang /
79b3('bum): gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mying dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
79b4('bum): reg pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa lam skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin/ le nad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
79b5('bum): nI le nad pa ma yin/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin du de ni skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
79b6('bum): ni rga she ma yin zhes zer// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dade ci'i phyir na de skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/
79b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i ma smyos pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha
79b8('bum): yid tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa den/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bisam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
80a1('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma
80a2('bum): yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor du/ ci'i phyir na de skad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
80a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
80a4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa don/ chen po spyod pa nyid ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mi skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma
80a5('bum): yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus so byas stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
80a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyim skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin thogs dang thas myed pa stong pa nyid
80a7('bum): skye skyes pa ga yin pa de thogs dang pas myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin dor bskyed pa spyong banyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa deni/ dong ba skyed pa stong pa nyidas sa/ rang bdi'i
80a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin chom thams cad stong pa nyid kyis smos pa gang yin pa de ni chom thams pad stong pa nyid ma yin / ni
80b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi sa skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/
80b2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos
80b3('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ dran pa nye bar
80b4('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba na mas kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par
80b5('bum): spong ba rnams ma yin/ chu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skye sa pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sa rnaM dbang po rnams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po/
80b6('bum): rnams ma yin/ stobs rnams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis skyes pa gang srin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin

81a1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang
81a2('bum): yin pa de ni/ rnam par thard pa rnams ma yin/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/

81a4('bum): ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin// ba de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin pa
81a5('bum): rnams ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhing gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
81a6('bum): ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
81a7('bum): ba de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje

81b1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yin/ rnam pa thams cad
81b2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyil skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin zhes zer// rab 'byor dkyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni/ gzugs kyis stong ste/
81b3('bum): kang steng pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i burnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
81b4('bum): su/ tshor pa ni rer bas steng ste/ gang steng pa de ni ra ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pag ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grang sa des na/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
81b5('bum): cher ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis steng ste/ gang steng pa de ni 'du shes ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
81b6('bum): grangs des na/ 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te skye ba myed do//
81b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang
81b8('bum): stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te sme ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'am grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang /
82a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi ka ni myika kis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ myig gi ma skyes pa gang
82a2('bum): yin pa de ni myig ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu na pa ni rna pas steng ste/ kang stong pa de ni rna ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i
82a3('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de smin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sA ni snas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
82a4('bum): sna'o ma skyes pa kang yid pa de ni snam yin no// dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce ni lces stong ste/ gang stong / pa de ni lce ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa
82a5('bum): sha ra dI ti'i pu na ma grangs des na lce'i ma skyes pa kang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pasha ra dra ti'i pu lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ gang stong
82a6('bum): pa de ni lus ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid
82a7('bum): ni yid kyis skyong ste/ klang steng pa de ni yid ma ldan te skye ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs de sa na yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
82a8('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis steng ste/ gang steng pa de ni ke zugs ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa
82b1('bum): gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra nI smras stong ste/ kAng stong pa de ni sgra ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

82b3('bum): dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro ni ros stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ro ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
82b4('bum): rolam skyes pa gang yin pa de ro ma yin no// tshe dang lnga/ nu ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg ni re kogs stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang
82b5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ reg gi rma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg ma yin no// tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos ni chos kyis stong ste/ gang
82b6('bum): stong pa de ni chos ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ chos ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi nam
82b7('bum): par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pas skyong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig gi rnam pa shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ya dwa ti'i mun pa grangs des na/ myig gi rnam par
82b8('bum): shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rtsig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i mun pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ na pa'i rnam par shes pas stong s+ho/ gang stong
83a1('bum): pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rna ba'i rnam/
83a2('bum): par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan
83a3('bum): ba shwa ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa ni
83a4('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang sted pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
83a5('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam parashes pa ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong
83a6('bum): pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pade/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/
83a7('bum): dang ldan dran na de'i sgra sri kyinas pa shes pa na 'a byinam par shes pas song ste/ gang stong pa ma srid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yi te/ smre bskyed do/ rje dang ldan bag na ti
83a8('bum): ram zangs sa na/ mi byirnam par shes pa'is skyes pa gang yin 'in pa nas mam sa/ se nga ldan pagar da ci'i bu phyag gi 'dus te reg pa chos gi
83b1('bum): reka pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ myig
83b2('bum): gi 'dus te reg phra ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i kun pa'i 'dus te reg pa ni na pa'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang spyod pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma smin te skye ba myed do// med
83b3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni
83b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni swa 'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// che dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sna'i 'dus te reg
83b5('bum): ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te/ reg pa ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang
83b6('bum): stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reka pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mu skyes pa gang yin pa de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma
83b7('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa
83b8('bum): ti'i bu nam grangs des ma/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
84a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
84a2('bum): sa skyes pa gang yin pa de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
84a3('bum): bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma
84a4('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye/ nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i
84a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
84a6('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sAl
84a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin te/ skye ba myed do//
84a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'im skyes pa gang yin pa de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
84b1('bum): ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang /
84b2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi
84b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang
84b4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no//
84b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend/ kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas/ stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
84b6('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang
84b7('bum): kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
84b8('bum): rnam grangs des na/ sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ sa'i khams la yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams ni nu'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang steng pa de ni chu'i khams
85a1('bum): ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ chu'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams
85a2('bum): ni mye'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mye'i khams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mye'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ mye'i khams ma yin no//
85a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams ni rlung khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rlung gyi khams kyi ma skyes
85a4('bum): pa gang yin pa de/ rlung gi khams ma yin no// tshe dang lAn ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams dkyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin
85a5('bum): te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nam ma' khams mo yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
85a6('bum): bu rnam par shes pa'i khams ni/ rnam par shes pa'i kham sa kyis stong ste/ kang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
85a7('bum): grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/
85a8('bum): gang stong pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin te skye ba byed do// me dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i burnam grangs des na/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no// me dang ldan bshar dwa
85b1('bum): tI'i bu 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ 'du
85b2('bum): byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par zhes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
85b3('bum): nam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs ni/ mying dang gzugs kyis stong ste/
85b4('bum): gang stong pa de ni/ mying dang gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mying dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ myi
85b5('bum): dang gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shur dwa to'o bu skye mched drug ni/ skye mched drug gis stong ste/ gang stong pa don/ skye mched drug ma yin te skye ba myed do// che dang
85b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ skye mched drug ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa ni/ reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg pa
85b7('bum): 'i/ skye bskyed do// rje dang ldan pa na ti'i phrinas grangs des / reg pa'i maskyes pa gang yin pa de dag pa badzin no// rtse dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu thor ba tshong bas spyong / gang rdzong/
85b8('bum): bdeni/ tshor ba ma yin te ste byed do// me dang ldan pag ran ti'i phrinas grangs des pa/ tshor pa'i bskyes pa gang yin pa 'i do// nga ldan pa na ma ci'i tha thed pa'i srid pamaso /
86a1('bum): gang stong pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ sred pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa lpend pa ni/
86a2('bum): lend pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lend pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lend pa'i mA glang yin pa de lend pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
86a3('bum): srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni srid pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
86a4('bum): ti'i bu skye ba ni skye bas stong ste gang stong pa de ni skye ba ma yin te skye bamyed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye dpa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
86a5('bum): sha ra burga/ shaM ni rga shis steng ste/ gang stong pa de ni rga shi ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no// che dang
86a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
86a7('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni
86a8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha ro long tu phyind pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bunas grangs des na tshul khrims kyi
86b1('bum): kyid ste ng+ge/ pa slod du myed pa sa sa// me dang ldan bag napa'i bu da pa'i pharoladu tu phyid pa / bzod pa'i pha mang tu phyin
86b2('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma'i te skye ba skyed do tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes can yidi de bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyinang /
86b3('bum): pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma
86b4('bum): yin te skye ba myed do/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
86b5('bum): tu phyind pa ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa ti'i bu bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/
86b6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan
86b7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bushes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni
86b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab
87a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang
87a2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid ni/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong
87a3('bum): ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no//
87a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid ni// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa
87a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// phye nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/
87a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang
87a7('bum): srin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid ni/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba
87a8('bum): myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes gagang na de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don
87b1('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin/
87b2('bum): bde/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan bshar dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis spyong ste/ gang spyong pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed
87b3('bum): ro/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa'i'adus ma byas stong pa nyid ni
87b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang spyod pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shi ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/
87b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtha' las
87b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des nA/ mtha'
87b7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni
87b8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ thog
88a1('bum): ma dang bus byed pa stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de/ thog sa dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid ni/ do
88a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis
88a3('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang bzhin
88a4('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa / ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rang bzhin spyod pa
88a5('bum): nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ chos thams cad ste nga pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ chos
88a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
88a7('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/
88a8('bum): skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
88b1('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
88b2('bum): grangs des na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang smin pa de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed
88b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma
88b4('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang
88b5('bum): stong pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myedado/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ ngo bo
88b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ dngos
88b7('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ dngos po myed
88b8('bum): pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ dran pa nye
89a1('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ dran pa nye bar
89a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams ma yin ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ yang dag par spyod/
89a3('bum): ba rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no//
89a4('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i burdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa/ de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do//
89a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rtsu phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
89a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ dbang po rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
89a7('bum): dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ dbang po rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs rnams ni/ stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni
89a8('bum): gobs rnams pa nate/ skye ba byed do// me dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bunas grangs des na skabs rnams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de/ spobs rnams ma yin no// me dang ldan bshar dgyis
89b1('bum): bu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
89b2('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/
89b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
89b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa na/ pa yin pa de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i
89b5('bum): bden pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa/ rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
89b6('bum): rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan rnams ni
89b7('bum): brasam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan nams su yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ bsam gtan rnams kyis skyes pa gang
89b8('bum): yin pa de/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chad myed pa rnams ni/ tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chad myed pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed
90a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chad myed pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshad myed pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i
90a2('bum): snyoms par 'dug pa rnams ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan
90a3('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
90a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thard pa rnams ni/ rnam par thar da pa rnams kyis sbyong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par/ tha rad pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan
90a5('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thard/ pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa da/ rnam par thar/ da pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa
90a6('bum): ti'i bu mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i
90a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bunas blangs des na/ mabadud kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams kyil skyes pa gang yin pa/
90a8('bum): de/ mab da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug sa nam yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i burnam par b.rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma byed pa dang / sond pa myed pa ni
90b1('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma yin te/
90b2('bum): skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed 'i []9/ rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa
90b3('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma byed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ mngon
90b4('bum): par shes pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang / ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mngon par she/ sa pa rnams kyi sa skyes pa gang yin pa de/ mngon par
90b5('bum): shes pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra d+ha ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin nams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin nas/
90b6('bum): ma yin te skye ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa gu ra dwa ti'i bunas grangs des na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de/ ting nge 'dzind rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
90b7('bum): swA kA rnangs sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgornams kyis dza)/ klung stong pa deni/ gzungs kyi dornams pa yin te skye bskyed do// de dang ldan bkar dwa ti'i branas grangs des su/ gsum
91a1('bum): kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs /
91a2('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/
91a3('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang
91a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin te/
91a5('bum): skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs de sa na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyesapa gang yin pa de/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
91a6('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byams pa chen po nA~M/ byams pa chen pos sbyong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
91a7('bum): bunas grangs des na/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ byams pachen thom yin no// da du ldan ba shar dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen pon/ snying rje chen pos sto ste/ ga nga
91a8('bum): pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
91b1('bum): ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang
91b2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
91b3('bum): ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
91b4('bum): grangs des na/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa ga nga yin pa de/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
91b5('bum): ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
91b6('bum): des na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni
91b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
91b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin no// smram pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ci'i phyir na de skad du gzugs kyi
92a1('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du
92a2('bum): byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ myig gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig ma yin
92a3('bum): rna ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin/ sna'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin/ lce'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin/ lus kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni lus ma
92a4('bum): yin/ yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin/ dri'i 'grib pa
92a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin/ ro'i 'grib ba gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin/ reg gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg ma yin/ chos kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de
92a6('bum): ni chos ma yin// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin
92a7('bum): gA'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lho'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes
92a8('bum): pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grim
92b1('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa' ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin/
92b2('bum): ba de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pas yin/ khro'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'asgrib pa gang yin pa de
92b3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang
92b4('bum): yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
92b5('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i/ rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus
92b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/
92b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sam
92b8('bum): khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin/ mye'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mye'i
93a1('bum): khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de mi nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i
93a2('bum): khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin// ma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed
93a3('bum): ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ mying dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mying dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drug gi
93a4('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin/ reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma yin// tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/
93a5('bum): sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin/ lend pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ le nad pa ma yin/ srid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ srid pa ma yin/
93a6('bum): skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
93a7('bum): hU~M phyin pa sa yi/ chus rnams kyi sa rosang du phyin du pa'i 'grib pa grang yin pa de ni/ rdus khrims kyi pa ro lung tu byidad pa ma yin / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa
93a8('bum): de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
93b1('bum): phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin//
93b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni
93b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid
93b4('bum): ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas
93b5('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yinamatha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa don
93b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grim
93b7('bum): bgrang yin pa denador ba myed pa stong pa nyid pa rang ba'i snod da kyi grib bkang yin pa den/ rang bzhin stong ba da thams pa stong ba nyid kyi 'grib pa
93b8('bum): ba deni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi macan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'i/ rang gis can nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ gyi dbyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa rom
94a1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/
94a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib
94a3('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi

94a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang/ chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam
94a6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas
94a7('bum): ma yina?/ bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ chad myed pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs myed
94a8('bum): pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sa yin/ rnam par man pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa sa da pa sa
94b1('bum): ma yin/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed/
94b2('bum): ba dang / sprod pa myed pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mnan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/

94b4('bum): ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mams ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa
94b5('bum): des/ kyi 'jigs pa rnams ma smidasas yang dag da rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pag du yin pa de ni/ yid/ byams pachen po'i rmi
94b6('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying me chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyab kyi
94b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa kAng yin pa de ni/ thams cad zhes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ las kyi rnam pa zhes
94b8('bum): banyid ma yin/ rnam pa thams par mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid pa mi ma sa /
95a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po drug pa'o// / rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar
95a2('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar myed pa gang yin pa dang /

95a6('bum): gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sna
95a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / gnyis su blar myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lus gang
95a8('bum): yin pa dang / gnyis su byar myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar myed pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/
95b1('bum): myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bltar myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin/

95b3('bum): su byar myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / gnyis su

101b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi
