101b7('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/
101b8('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
102a1('bum): ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / dbang po rnams ma yin
102a2('bum): stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam
102a3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
102a4('bum): ma yin/ bsam gtan nas kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'gri pa ba gang yin pa de yang / tshad myed pa rnams ma yin/
102a5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa/ gang yin pa de yang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang
102a6('bum): yin pa de yang / rnam par b.rad pa rnams ma yin/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/
102a7('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa
102a8('bum): myed pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / ting nge 'dzind rnams ma yin
102b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/
102b2('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma
102b3('bum): yin// byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / snyi rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
102b4('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gyi
102b5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / lam gyi/ rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
102b6('bum): nyid ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ gang 'di gzugs shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di tshor ba shes bya ba de ni/
102b7('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// klung 'di 'du shes shes bya ba da ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas
102b8('bum): pa'o// gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di myig ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rna ba
103a1('bum): zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di ni sna zhes bya ba 'di ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di lce zhes bya ba 'di ni/ gnyis su/
103a2('bum): myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di lus shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di yid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di gzugs
103a3('bum): zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di smra zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di dri zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs
103a4('bum): su byas pa'o// gang 'di ro zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di reg ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di
103a5('bum): chos shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su byed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya bde ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
103a6('bum): gang 'di na ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di sna'i rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
103a7('bum): gang 'di lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang
103a8('bum): 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di
103b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i mangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di
103b2('bum): 'i 'dus nyi shu pa'is / nyis su stod pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di lus ng+ge 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myeng pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di med
103b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa zhes bu bA de ni/ gnyis su skyed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
103b4('bum): gang 'din pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes
103b5('bum): bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba/ de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// ga
103b6('bum): 'di lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis
103b7('bum): su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di sa'i khams shes b+ha ba de nI/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di chu'i khams zhes bya ba deni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su
103b8('bum): byas pa'o// gang 'di mye'i khams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rlung gi khams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di
104a1('bum): nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'drinam par zhes pa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
104a2('bum): gang 'dim na pazhes bya ba 'o/ nyis su myed pa'i gras su byas pa/ gang 'di 'du byed ces bya dzin gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya
104a3('bum): ni/ gnyis su byed pa'i mangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di phying dang gzugs zhes bya ba de / gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di skye mched drug ces bya ba de'i/ gnyis su myed
104a4('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// glang 'di reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su
104a5('bum): byas pa'o// gang 'di sred pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di lend pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o
104a6('bum): gang 'di srid pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di skye ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rga shi zhes bya ba de ni
104a7('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
104a8('bum): ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyird pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha
104b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di shes
104b2('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di phyi stong pa
104b3('bum): nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba
104b4('bum): de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid ces
104b5('bum): bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di 'dus ma byas
104b6('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di
104b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
104b8('bum): gang 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
105a1('bum): gang 'di rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs
105a2('bum): su byas pa'o// gang 'di dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/
105a3('bum): gang 'di dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs
105a4('bum): su byas pa'o// gang 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams she/ sa bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis
105a5('bum): su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di dbang po rna/ mas shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di stobs rnams shes bya ba de ni/
105a6('bum): gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
105a7('bum): pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di bsas
105a8('bum): gtan rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di chad myed pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di gzugs myed
105b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rnam par tha rad pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
105b2('bum): gang 'di mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
105b3('bum): smond pa myed zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di ting nge 'dzind nas
105b4('bum): shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di de bzhin gshes/
105b5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di myi 'jigs pa rnams she/ sa bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
105b6('bum): gang 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di byams pa chen po zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su byed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang
105b7('bum): 'dri snying rje chen po zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang
105b8('bum): 'di thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rnam/
106a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// zhes zer// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar gzugs
106a2('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzugs
106a3('bum): shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshor ba/ tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/
106a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin
106a5('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'a/ du shes/ 'du shes nyid kyang myed ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang / ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'du shes
106a6('bum): shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'du byed kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin// ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang ma skyes
106a7('bum): ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/
106a8('bum): skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di rnam par shes
106b1('bum): pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar myig kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myig/ myig nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/
106b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di myig ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rna pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin
106b3('bum): te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rna ba rna ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rna ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
106b4('bum): 'di ltar sna yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sna/ sna nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
106b5('bum): des na/ gang 'di sna zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lce yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te
106b6('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang lce/ lce nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ rje dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ gang 'di lce zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar
106b7('bum): lus kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lus/ lus nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nas grangs nges na/ gang 'di
106b8('bum): lus zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar yid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid/ yid nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/
107a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di yid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
107a2('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzugs shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di
107a3('bum): ltar sgra yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang smra / sgra nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di smra zhes bya ba de ni/
107a4('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dri ya nga gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te// ma skyes pa nyid kyang dri/ dri nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
107a5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dri zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar/ ro yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
107a6('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang ro// ro nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ro zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar reg kyang /
107a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang reg/ reg nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di reg bya ba de ni/ gnyis
107a8('bum): su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar chos kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chos chos nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i/
107b1('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di chos zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
107b2('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya
107b3('bum): ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
107b4('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshed nga ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rna ba 'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i
107b5('bum): grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yi/ nu te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa
107b6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas
107b7('bum): pa'o// 'di ltar/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/
107b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan
108a1('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i kunam grangs/
108a2('bum): des na/ gang 'di lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
108a3('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di yod kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya
108a4('bum): ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skye sa pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myig gi
108a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skye/ sa pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis
108a6('bum): su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te re ga pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
108a7('bum): nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg
108a8('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
108b1('bum): gang 'di sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
108b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i
108b3('bum): grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
108b4('bum): nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas
108b5('bum): pa'o// 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa/ yid kyi 'dus te
108b6('bum): reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar
108b7('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
108b8('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su
109a1('bum): byas pa'o// 'di ltar na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
109a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed
109a3('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/
109a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba
109a5('bum): de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan mam na/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang /
109a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyund kyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ gang 'di lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
109a7('bum): kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa sang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes/
109a8('bum): pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di lus kyi/
109b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan/
109b2('bum): ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/
109b3('bum): gang 'di yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin/
109b4('bum): te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sa'i khams/ sa'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sa'i khams shes
109b5('bum): bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chub zhes
109b6('bum): chu'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di chu'i khams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar
109b7('bum): mye'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mye'i khams mye'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
109b8('bum): des na/ gang 'di mye'i khams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
110a1('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rlung gi khams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su
110a2('bum): myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang ma
110a3('bum): skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams
110a4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
110a5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par shes po'i khams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grang sa su byas pa'o// 'di ltar ma rig pa yang gzhan ma yin
110a6('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ma rig pam rig pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ma rig pa zhes bya ba de ni/
110a7('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'du byed kyang gzhan ma yin/ mra skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang
110a8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin/
110b1('bum): te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs
110b2('bum): su byas pa'o// 'di ltar mying dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
110b3('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mying dang gzugs shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma
110b4('bum): yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang skye mched drug/ skye mchedad drug nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti de'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di skye mched drug ces bya ba
110b5('bum): de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar reg pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang reg pa/ reg pa nyid kyang /
110b6('bum): ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ gang 'dri rig pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes
110b7('bum): ba yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshor ba/ tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rjor ba zhes bya ba dri ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i
110b8('bum): grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar sred pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sred pa/ sred pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
111a1('bum): nam grangs des na/ gang 'di sred pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lend pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
111a2('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang lend pa/ lend pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lend pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar
111a3('bum): srid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang srid pa/ srid pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di srid pa
111a4('bum): zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar skye ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang skye ba/ skye ba nyid kyang ma
111a5('bum): skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs de sa na/ gang 'di skye ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed/ pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rga/ shi yang gzhan
111a6('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rga shi rga shi nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di na/ sha~M zhes bya ba de ni
111a7('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa/ sbyin
111a8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang ma skyes ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bunam grangs des na/ gang 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myeng ba'i grangs su byas pa'o/
111b1('bum): 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin la rje gnas pa shes skyes pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pas
111b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma
111b3('bum): yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu rnam grangs
111b4('bum): des na/ gang 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// / 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan
111b5('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/
111b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha
111b7('bum): ro lad tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ brasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang ma skyes
111b8('bum): ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar shes rab
112a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang ma
112a2('bum): skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// /
112a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya/ bam po 'dun pa'o// 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid
112a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid/ nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
112a5('bum): num grangs des na/ gang 'di nang stong pa nyid ces zla ba de na/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhanam
112a6('bum): yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis
112a7('bum): su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar phyin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes
112b1('bum): ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba doni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan pa
112b2('bum): yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'ang
112b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
112b4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sa skyes pa/ ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ grang 'di chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su
112b5('bum): myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid/
112b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ gang 'di de ni dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
112b7('bum): 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste dang
112b8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i mangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ga'
113a1('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
113a2('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes
113a3('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
113a4('bum): gang 'di mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
113a5('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
113a6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
113a7('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di
113a8('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid
113b1('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bzhi yo kyim skye ste tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
113b2('bum): 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/
113b3('bum): ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid
113b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/
113b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i rnam grangs des na gang 'od rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar myi dmyigs
113b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
113b7('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs dres na/ gang 'di myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
113b8('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang
114a1('bum): 'di dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
114a2('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su/
114a3('bum): myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngol byed pa chub nyid stong pa
114a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba
114a5('bum): de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dran pa
114a6('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis
114a7('bum): su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong
114a8('bum): rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
114b1('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
114b2('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan
114b3('bum): ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dbang po rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su
114b4('bum): myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma ya na te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang stobs rnams/ stobs
114b5('bum): rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// gang 'di stobs rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar
114b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang
114b7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
114b8('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
115a1('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang /
115a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
115a3('bum): grangs des na/ gang 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang
115a4('bum): gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams// bsam gtan rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di bsam
115a5('bum): gtan rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzha na ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma
115a6('bum): skyes pa nyid kyang chad myed pa rnams cad med pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ gang 'di tshad myed pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs
115a7('bum): su myed pa'o// 'di ltar gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug phra rnams kyang gzhan ma yin// ma skyes pa yang gzhan sa yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams
115a8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/
115b1('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rnam par thard pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams/ rnam par thar/
115b2('bum): pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di rnam par tha rad pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar mthar
115b3('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar kyis
115b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes
115b5('bum): bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin
115b6('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa byed pa/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / ma mtshan
115b7('bum): myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa che
115b8('bum): zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa
116a1('bum): rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs//
116a2('bum): su byas pa'o// 'di ltar ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/
116a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ting nge 'dzind rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan
116a4('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes/ pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo nams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
116a5('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan
116a6('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
116a7('bum): ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/
116a8('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang kyi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ gang 'di kyi
116b1('bum): 'jigs pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa
116b2('bum): nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so mo yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ gang 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shes/
116b3('bum): bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar byams pa chen po yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po byams pa
116b4('bum): chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di byams pa chen po zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
116b5('bum): 'di ltar snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
116b6('bum): dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na/ gang 'di snying rje chen po zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ga'adas yin
116b7('bum): skyes pa yang gzhan sa yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dres pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bum
116b8('bum): grangs des na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/
117a1('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des
117a2('bum): na/ gang 'di rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan
117a3('bum): ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lan
117a4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar phyir myi 'o / ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan
117a5('bum): ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang lnga na ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di phyir myi 'ong/
117a6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma smyos pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa
117a7('bum): nyid/ dam bcom pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan bshur dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis sa med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar
117a8('bum): rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang byang chub rang byang chub nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
117b1('bum): gang 'di rang byang chub ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa
117b2('bum): nyid byangalas gyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid/ las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang la skyes pa ste/ me dang ldan pa sha ma dwa ti'i burnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lam gri rnas pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/
117b3('bum): gnyis su snyed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
117b4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyidangam skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i grwa dam rba ngas des ma/ gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
117b5('bum): nyid ces bya ba de ni/ gnyis su myed po'i grangs su/ byas pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyi sa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gselang to//
117b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe/ shinang tu
117b7('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi sa skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i skad du/ nor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i
117b8('bum): slad du/ 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par
118a1('bum): shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du// myig gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ na ba'i
118a2('bum): ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sA'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi dang
118a3('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shau nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur// shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du
118a4('bum): gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mamed par 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam pa ra dag pa'i slad du/ sgra'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dri'i ma skyes pa mthong bar
118a5('bum): 'gyur/ shau nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ re'i ma skyes pa yeng bar 'gyur/ shau nad tu rnam par dag/ pa'i slad du/ reg gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur
118a6('bum): yi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par
118a7('bum): dag pa'i slad du/ nu ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mo skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par
118a8('bum): dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i sa skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i la skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam

118b5('bum): mthong ba 'gyunang tu rnam par dag pa'i slang du/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye da kyis tshong bu'i maskyes pa bar 'gyur/ shid tu rnam par dag pa'i slad d+ha/ sna'i
118b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa yong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par
118b7('bum): dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes
118b8('bum): pa mthong bar 'gyur// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi na tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar
119a1('bum): 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ mye'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur
119a2('bum): shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind
119a3('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du
119a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ mying dang gzugs kyi ma skye sa pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i
119a5('bum): slad du/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa/ mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
119a6('bum): tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sdang du/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lend pa'i ma skyes pa mthong /
119a7('bum): bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dgra pa'i slad du/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam
119a8('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad
119b1('bum): du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi na tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam
119b2('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa
119b3('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du// nang stong pa
119b4('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bur 'gyur/ shin tu rnam pa/ rwa dag pa'i skad du/ byi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa thong bar 'gyur/ shinadu tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du
119b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ stong pa nyid sto pa nyid kyis skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu
119b6('bum): par dag pa'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi
119b7('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i skad du/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa mthong 'thung shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slang du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis smyos pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin
119b8('bum): thunam par dag pa'i slad du/ mdza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang turnam par dag pa'i slad du/ thon ma dang pa ma byed pa stong pa nyid kyis rnas
120a1('bum): pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
120a2('bum): kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi na tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang gi mtshan nyid
120a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos
120a4('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi// ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par
120a5('bum): dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi da kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
120a6('bum): kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
120a7('bum): pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ stobs rnams
120a8('bum): kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'phags
120b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag
120b2('bum): pa'i slad du/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par
120b3('bum): dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs myed pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams kyis skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong
120b4('bum): bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamasakyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shAnang tu rnam
120b5('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i/ ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par
120b6('bum): dag pa'i slad du/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin
120b7('bum): turnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis skyes pa mtho
120b8('bum): bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis
121a1('bum): skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes/
121a2('bum): pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ thams cad shes pa
121a3('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shand tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams
121a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du// so so'i skye bo'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ sha nad tu rnam par dag
121a5('bum): pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i sa skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam
121a6('bum): par dag pa'i skad du/ rgyu rang tu zhugs pa'i chos kyi sa skyes pa mthong par 'gyur/ shinang tu rnam pa dag pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bskyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang tu
121a7('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi me skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shinang du
121a8('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag
121b1('bum): pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'akur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i
121b2('bum): slad du/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shind tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma smos pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du
121b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du
121b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ de nas me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan/ ba rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag
121b5('bum): kis rje dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis smras pa'i/ don/ sa pa skar na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes la/ bsrang ma skyes pa/ 'du shes kyang ma skyes pa
121b6('bum): 'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa// myig kyang ma skyes la/ na bo yang ma skyes pa/ sna yang ma skyes pa/ lce yang ma skyes pa/ lus kyang ma
121b7('bum): skyes pa/ yid kyang ma skyes pa// gzugs kyang ma skyes la/ sgra yang ma skyes pa/ dri yang ma skyes pa/ ro yang ma skyes pa/ reg kyang ma skyes pa/ chos kyang ma
121b8('bum): skyes pa/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang ma
122a1('bum): skyes pa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang
122a2('bum): ma skyes pa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ myig
122a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes la/ rna po'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ lce'i
122a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang skyes pa/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang ma skyes
122a5('bum): pa// sa'i khams kyang ma skyes la/ chu'i kham sa kyang ma skyes pa/ mye'i khams kyang ma skyes pa// rlung gi khams kyang ma skyes pa/ nam mkha'i khams
122a6('bum): kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang ma ste sa pa// mi rig pa yang ma skyes la/ 'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa
122a7('bum): mying dang gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ skye mched drug kyang ma skyes pa/ reg pa yang ma skyes pa/ tshor ba yang ma skyes pa/ sred pa yang ma skyes pa/ lend pa yang ma skyes pa
122a8('bum): srid pa yang ma skyes pa/ skye ba yang mo skyes pa/ shi yang ma skyes pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang mo skyes la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang ma skyes pa
122b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang ma skyes pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang ma skyes pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang ma skyes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol
122b2('bum): tu phyind pa yang ma skyes pa// rang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes la/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa
122b3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ mtha'
122b4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ thog ma dang / tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ dor ba myedapa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
122b5('bum): ma skyes pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ dngos
122b6('bum): po gyod pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa// drang pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes
122b7('bum): la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang skyes pa/ dbang po rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag
122b8('bum): rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ 'phags po'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang ma skyes pa// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma skyes la/ bsam gtan bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ chad
123a1('bum): myed pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ rnam par ba rad pa brgyad kyang ma skyes pa/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
123a2('bum): 'dug par dgu sang ma skyes pa/ rnam par ba rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonod pa myed pa yang ma skyes pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ ting nge 'dzin
123a3('bum): rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang ma skyes la/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang ma skyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa ba
123a4('bum): yang ma skyes pa/ byams pa chen po yang ma skyes pa/ snying rje chen po yang ma skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'a dres pa bco kyang ma skyes pa/ thams cad shes pa nyid
123a5('bum): kyang ma skyes la/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/ so so'i skye bo yang ma skyes la/ so so'i
123a6('bum): skye bo'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa yang ma skyes pa/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang ma skyes pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang
123a7('bum): ma skyes pa/ phyir myi 'ong ba yang ma skyes pa/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ dgra bcom pa yang ma skyes pa/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyang
123a8('bum): ma skyes pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes pa/
123b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa yin na// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de ltar gal te/ gzugs kyang skye ba myed la/ tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ 'du shes kyang skye ba myed/ 'du byed kyang
123b2('bum): skye ba myed/ rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ myig kyang skye ba myed la/ rna ba yang skye ba myed/ sna yang skye ba myed/ lce yang skye ba myed/ lus kyang skye ba myed/ yid kyang skye ba myed
123b3('bum): gzugs kyang skye ba myed la/ sgra yang skye ba myed dri yang skye ba byed/ ro yang skye ba myed/ reg kyang skye ba byed/ chos kyang skye ba byed// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed la
123b4('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang skye/ ba myed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed
123b5('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ myig gi 'du/ sa te reg pa'i yang skye ba myed la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg/ pa yang skye ba myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang skye
123b6('bum): ba myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang skye ba myed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
123b7('bum): ba yang skye ba myed la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
123b8('bum): yang skye ba myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang skye ba myed/ sa'i khams kyang skye ba myed la/
124a1('bum): chu'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ mye'i khams kyang skye ba myed/ rlung gi khams kyang skye ba myed/ nam mkha'i khams kyang skye bu myed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang skye ba myed/
124a2('bum): ma rig pa yang skye ba myed la/ 'du byed kyang skye ba myed/ rnam par shes pa yang skye ba myed/ mying dang gzugs kyang skye ba myed/ skye mched drug kyang skye ba myed/ reg pa yang skye ba myed/ tshor
124a3('bum): bu yang skye ba myed/ sred pa yang skye ba myed/ le nad pa yang skye ba myed/ srid pa yang skye ba myed/ skye ba yang skye ba myed/ rga shi yang skye ba myed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyir pa yang
124a4('bum): skye ba myed la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang skye ba myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang skye ba myed/ bapon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang skye
124a5('bum): ba myed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang skye ba myed/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang skye ba mye/ da// nang stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed la/ phyi stong
124a6('bum): pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang skye ba byed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ 'dus byas
124a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ mams ga la gyad kyang stsal la da / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ thog ma dang tha ma
124a8('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ rang gi mtshan
124b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ myi dmyigs pa stong panyid kyang skye ba myed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
124b2('bum): skye ba myed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang skye ba myed la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang skye ba myed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ dbang po rnams kyang skye ba myed/
124b3('bum): stobs rnams kyang skye ba myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang skye ba myed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang skye ba myed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang skye ba myed la
124b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyang skye ba myed/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang nga skye ba myed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ rnams kyang skye ba myed/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyang
124b5('bum): skye ba myed/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ pa dgu yang skye ba myed/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa
124b6('bum): yang skye ba byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang skye ba myed/ ting nge 'dzind nams kyang skye ba byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang skye ba myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang skye ba myed/
124b7('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang skye ba myed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang skye ba myed/ byams pa chen po yang skye ba myed/ snying rje chen po yang skye ba myed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
124b8('bum): pa bco brgyad kyang skye ba myed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang skye ba myed la/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang skye ba myed/ so so'i skye bo
125a1('bum): yang skye ba myed la/ so so'i skye ba'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang skye ba myed/ rgyunang tu zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang skye ba myed/ lan
125a2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ phyir myi 'ong ba yang skye ba byed/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ dgra bcom pa yang skye ba byed/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ rang
125a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyang skye ba myed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba myed/ byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba myed/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba myed/ sangs rgyas kyang skye ba
125a4('bum): myed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba myed na ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
125a5('bum): bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob zi nad par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob
125a6('bum): zind par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob zind par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha myi dad par
125a7('bum): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / byang chub rnam lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dgal te/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa
125a8('bum): yin na/ ci'i phyir na rgyu nad tu zhugs pas ni/ kund tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir/ lam snyoms lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/
125b1('bum): lam bsgoms/ phyir myi 'ong bas ni dam pa ma yin pa'i mtshan gyi/ kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i lam bsgoms dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir lam
125b2('bum): bsgoms/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sa zhugs pa sa ni/ rang byang chub kyi don tum ma bsgoms/ 'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi
125b3('bum): don tu de ltar/ sdug bsngal nyams su spong bar byed cing / dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod/ ci'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ mngo
125b4('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ci'i phyir na de bzhinagaklas pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskod// des da ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis
125b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni/ chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud pa yod par
125b6('bum): myi 'dod de ma skyes pa la/ rgyun du tu zhugs pa yod pa myi 'dod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par gyi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par gyi
125b7('bum): 'dod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par myi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la phyir myi 'ong ba yod par myi 'dod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par myi 'dod do// ma skyes pa
125b8('bum): la dgra bcom pa yod par myi 'dod do// dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par myi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par myi 'dod do// rang byang chub yod par myi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan
126a1('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod par myi 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dka' ba spyod
126a2('bum): pa'i 'du shes kyis myi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na/ sems can chad myed grangs myed pa'i don bya bar myi nus kyi tshe dang ldan pa
126a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can rnams la/ mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas/ sems can
126a4('bum): grangs myed chad myed pa'i don bya ba de yang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems da dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'di ltar sems bskyed de/
126a5('bum): ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya yang / do ni thams cad du tham sa cad/ rnam pa thams cad du/ thams cad myed cing myi dmyigs pa/ de bzhin du/ phyi nang gi chos rnams la
126a6('bum): yang / 'du shes bskyed de/ de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang / dka' ba'i 'du shes myi bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos gang yang myi lend/ myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro//
126a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni ma skyes pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa yod par myi 'dod/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par myi 'dod de/ de bzhin gshegs
126a8('bum): pas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa 'am/ 'thob par bya ba myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga khyod chos skyes pas/ 'thob
126b1('bum): ba dang / 'thob par bya bar 'dod dam/ 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod/ rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni/ skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob
126b2('bum): par myi 'dod do// ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par myi 'dod do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da 'o nA~M/ 'thob pa byed pa la/ mngon par rtogs pa myed dam/ rab 'byor kyis
126b3('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'thob pa yang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de/ gnyis kyis ma yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa ni/
126b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyiramyi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs
126b5('bum): rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpal 'am/ sangs rgyas dag kyang / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis btags pa ste/ don dam pas ni 'thob pa 'am
126b6('bum): mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/
126b7('bum): sangs rgyas su gdags pa myed de// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa/ de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang
126b8('bum): 'jig rten gyi tha dad kyi/ don dam par ma yin pa/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du/
127a1('bum): yod pa de bzhin du/ 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du/ tha da kyi don dam par ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dor dam par ni
127a2('bum): las kyang myed las kyi rnam par smyind pa yang myed/ skye ba yang myed/ 'gag pa yang myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang myed/ rnam par byang ba yang myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab
127a3('bum): 'byor nga ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on tam skye ba'i chos skye bar 'gyur// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar gyi
127a4('bum): 'dod/ skye ba'i chos kyang skye bar myi 'dod do// smras pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar myi 'dod pa gang yin//

127a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni/ tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do//
127a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni/ 'du shes ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis/ stong pa skye bar myi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni/ 'du byed ma skye ba rang bzhin gyis
