308a4('bum): khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur/ zhi ba 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'o/ gyur ro// 'dus ma byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam
308a5('bum): par rtog par myi 'akur/ dben pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de
308a6('bum): ltar zab pa/ de ltar brtag du myi rung ba/ de ltar brtag du myi rung ba'i spyod yul/ de ltar phra ba/ de ltar gsal ba/ de ltar blta dka' ba/ de ltar rtogs par dka' ba/ de ltar
308a7('bum): zhi ba/ de ltar bzang ba/ de ltar shind tu 'phags pa/ de ltar ma'os shing shes pas rig par bya ba de la yid ches par byed pa su yang myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di la
308a8('bum): ches gang yang la brjod la bshad do// ji ltar 'di la chol gang yang la brjod la bshad pa de bzhin du/ 'di la sems can gang yang yid ches par byed pa myed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
308b1('bum): bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da 'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
308b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher ma bkod dam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba yang ma bstand ta ma/ sems dang po bskyed pa
308b3('bum): nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang /
308b4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gta/ na gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
308b5('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma
308b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
308b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
308b8('bum): pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
309a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam sar lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i dang / bsam gtan ba'i dang / chad myed pa ba'i dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
309a2('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa
309a3('bum): lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
309a4('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho/ sa ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma bstand tam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par
309a5('bum): shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par che ba rnams kyi ngam bstand tam/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
309a6('bum): la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes myi bya 'am/ des na mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhes myi bya 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
309a7('bum): du 'dring zhing dge ba'i ma gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i
309a8('bum): chab de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhes kyi bya 'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du/
309b1('bum): nam yang rgyu nad 'chad par myi 'gyur ro zhes kyi bya 'am/ 'jug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// zhes myi bya 'am/ myi dmyigs pa'i/
309b2('bum): tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyu nad 'cha dpa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don
309b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i/ spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur zhes myi bya 'am/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
309b4('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las thadag pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs
309b5('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher bstand to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzug
309b6('bum): ba yang bstand sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i' lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
309b7('bum): phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang //
309b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
313a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
313a2('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
313a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
313a4('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar ga/ zhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang
313a5('bum): stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
313a6('bum): myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i
313a7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
313a8('bum): stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ni ci'i phyir bstan
313b1('bum): ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstand cing / des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
313b2('bum): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing des na mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su nyam pa byed pa'i chos car du 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na
313b3('bum): des sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
313b4('bum): mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang
313b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag
313b6('bum): pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa
313b7('bum): dpag rgya nad 'chang byed pa'i sebs pa dang / mnyam par gzhug pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brelang ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
313b8('bum): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan pa lu na/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la
314a1('bum): 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstand to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
314a2('bum): kyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bsta na to// byi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg
314a3('bum): pa gsum rgya cher bstand to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan
314a4('bum): to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstand to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher
314a5('bum): bstan to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi myigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstand to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
314a6('bum): gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstand to// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstand to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya
314a7('bum): cher bstan to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bsku rang to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//
314a8('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstand to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstand to// ngo bo nyid stong pa
314b1('bum): nyid kyi phyir gyi dbyigs pa'i tshul gyi ma theg pa gsum rgya che bstad to/ dngom po byed pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir gyi dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis reg pa gsum rgya zer bstand to// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byas
314b2('bum): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mangs su gzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
314b3('bum): ci su mi kyimayos tsa byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong /
314b4('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
314b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa ste/ nga pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
314b6('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
314b7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
314b8('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
315a1('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
315a2('bum): ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / khams pa ca
315a3('bum): ba dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par phye ba dag
315a4('bum): kyang bstand te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus/ te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams
315a5('bum): la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i mapa gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya
315a6('bum): ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang
315a7('bum): thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur dgye bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam
315a8('bum): par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i
315b1('bum): spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang
315b2('bum): ldan par 'gyur ro// byi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bsra ba bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub
315b3('bum): sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bapon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
315b4('bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
315b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don da ma pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
315b6('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
315b7('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
315b8('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
316a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par ba rad pa brgyad dang /
316a2('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge
316a3('bum): 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang
316a4('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa babargyad dag kyang bstan da/ byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis
316a5('bum): rnam par the ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na
316a6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
316a7('bum): la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
316a8('bum): de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis
316b1('bum): kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun lad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang /
316b2('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i/
316b3('bum): spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed
316b4('bum): pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang
316b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
316b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
316b7('bum): ba nyid dang / theg ma dang tha ma skyed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs
316b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba'i dang
317a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
317a2('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
317a3('bum): bar tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
317a4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco/
317a5('bum): brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rtsu' phrul gyis rnam par phye ba dag kyang bstand te/ des na byang
317a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du
317a7('bum): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhingadi dge ba'i pha ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu rud du bya ba dang /
317a8('bum): mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa pa de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par/
317b1('bum): ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'jug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
317b2('bum): chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i
317b3('bum): spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang / yang ldan par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
317b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta
317b5('bum): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam
317b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // rang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi dang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
317b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor
317b8('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
318a1('bum): ngob nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba'i dang / sang dag par spong ba ba'i dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba'i dang / dbang po lnga
318a2('bum): dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs
318a3('bum): byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par ba rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
318a4('bum): myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
318a5('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstand// byang
318a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par che ba dag kyang bstand te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol
318a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing
318a8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i cha ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs
318b1('bum): par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang /
318b2('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun
318b3('bum): 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las yon
318b4('bum): shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po yongs su gzung ba bstand to// sems dang po
318b5('bum): bskyed pa nas sems tha rtsu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems da pa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
318b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi
318b7('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
318b8('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs
319a1('bum): bstong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / drang pa nye bar gzhag pa ba'i dang / yang dag par spong ba bani
319a2('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan
319a3('bum): bzhi dang / chad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo sto/
319a4('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
319a5('bum): bcu dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/
319a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par che ba dag kyang bstand te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol
319a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi nang du 'dong zhing dge
319a8('bum): ba'i ma ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par
319b1('bum): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur da gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad myed par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang /
319b2('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang gtu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad
319b3('bum): ba myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon
319b4('bum): par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par/ 'gyur ro//
319b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu pa / don dam pa stong
319b6('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha
319b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes
319b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
320a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
320a2('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
320a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
320a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par
320a5('bum): tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju/ ga pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par
320a6('bum): shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
320a7('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par
320a8('bum): ze ba dag kyang bstand te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su
320b1('bum): nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i kha ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang
320b2('bum): bu drung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad
320b3('bum): mkhye dad pa nyid thob par ma kru ra kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//
320b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'ad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs
320b5('bum): pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'breld pa'i spob/ sa pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig/ rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs
320b6('bum): ba'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod sa su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed/
320b7('bum): ba nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi rang pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
320b8('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phye stong pa
321a1('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
321a2('bum): nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
321a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // drang ba nye bar
321a4('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba'i dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
321a5('bum): pa'i lam yan laka brkyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par
321a6('bum): rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i stobs par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par ba rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes
321a7('bum): ba lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
321a8('bum): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par me ba
321b1('bum): ngag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing chus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// res na mngon par zhes pa rnams la yongs su nyam sa/
321b2('bum): myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i ma ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang /
321b3('bum): phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad
321b4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyu nad 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par ga/ zhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par
321b5('bum): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag
321b6('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang /
321b7('bum): yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i
321b8('bum): bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la ba 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha ro mang tu phyi rang ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha ro lad tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha ro lang du byedangad pa dang / bsod 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa
322a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
322a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang
322a3('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo
322a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
322a5('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ba/ zhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang /
322a6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
322a7('bum): smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
322a8('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstand// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon
322b1('bum): par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par che ba dag kyang bstar te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing nus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na
322b2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim
322b3('bum): gror bya ba dang / bkur bster bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
322b4('bum): dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pad nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag
322b5('bum): pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur/ ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang /
322b6('bum): rgyund 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten
322b7('bum): thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang / yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
322b8('bum): bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
323a1('bum): dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa
323a2('bum): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
323a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
323a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
323a5('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar ba zhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
323a6('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs
323a7('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par ba rang pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
323a8('bum): smod pa byed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa pa'i dang / som
323b1('bum): yang dag par rig pa pa'i dang / byams pa chen po dang / shing rjechen po dang / sangs rgyas rgya chos sa 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstand// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ldan po rnams /
323b2('bum): par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par me badrug kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dpal spyod cing nus te skye bar 'gyur zhes rgya
323b3('bum): des na mngon par shes pa rnams so yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos par du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi 'a du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag po/
323b4('bum): rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs
323b5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang na/ ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du/ nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa
323b6('bum): myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs
323b7('bum): pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i
323b8('bum): spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
324a1('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstand to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
324a2('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
324a3('bum): phyi nad pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
324a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
324a5('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong
324a6('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi
324a7('bum): dang dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan ban
324a8('bum): dang tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam sbyar tha rad pa brgyad dang / mabard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong
324b1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
324b2('bum): myi 'jigs pa ba'i dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstand/ byang chub sems
324b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par che ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
324b4('bum): pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
324b5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i pha ba gang gis sangs rgya bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya
324b6('bum): bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
324b7('bum): ma gyur ba gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chang par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
324b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs
325a1('bum): pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//
325a2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam
325a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam
325a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
325a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
325a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
325a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
325a8('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
325b1('bum): lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar
325b2('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams
325b3('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
325b4('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstand/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
325b5('bum): gyis rnam par che ba dag kyang bstand te/ des na byang chub sa/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//
325b6('bum): des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
325b7('bum): dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
325b8('bum): 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur dgyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul
326a1('bum): gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i
326a2('bum): spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
326a3('bum): shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstand to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas
326a4('bum): sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sprin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
326a5('bum): tu phyind pa dang / bachad ma lang yang tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang/
326a6('bum): pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
326a7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong
326a8('bum): pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
326b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdud dang / 'phags pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan/
326b2('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar
326b3('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin
326b4('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mya 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
326b5('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshe sa ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstand/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par
326b6('bum): shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par me ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes byan
326b7('bum): des ma mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa skyed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i sa bkang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
326b8('bum): 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs
327a1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur da gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang /
327a2('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang /
327a3('bum): rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thos
327a4('bum): cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa/ dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
327a5('bum): yongs su gzung ba bstand to// sems dang po bskye da pa nas sems bcupa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyinang
327a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab
327a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong
327a8('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa
327b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
327b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / drang pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
327b3('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang
327b4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong
327b5('bum): po nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad du/ nga gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
327b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang
327b7('bum): bstarang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par che ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
327b8('bum): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
328a1('bum): kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phudud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya/
328a2('bum): par 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i za ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur dkyi
328a3('bum): bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
328a4('bum): chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i
328a5('bum): spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mdo na bar 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan
328a6('bum): par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstand to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa
328a7('bum): ber gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
328a8('bum): tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
328b1('bum): nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
328b2('bum): dang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
328b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
328b4('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bde na pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi
328b5('bum): dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha dad pa'i/
328b6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
328b7('bum): stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa ba'i dang / so mo yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan
328b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par me ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu
329a1('bum): byind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
329a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'do zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i
329a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam
329a4('bum): yang rgyu nad 'chad par yang myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/
329a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyi dmyi gas pa'i tshul gyis thog byed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun lachad pa myed pa'i spobs pa mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang
329a6('bum): rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brelang pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyud zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan
329a7('bum): bar 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i
329a8('bum): bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / bson 'grus kyi pha rol pa
329b1('bum): tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
329b2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
329b3('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong/
329b4('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bya/ zhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
329b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stong sa lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phra gas pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
329b6('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha dad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
329b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha radang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams
329b8('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang
330a1('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul/
330a2('bum): gyis rnam par che ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon
330a3('bum): par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge bo'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim
330a4('bum): gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kya pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom
330a5('bum): ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur da gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang /
330a6('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang /
330a7('bum): rgyun 'chang pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad
330a8('bum): las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang / yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstand to//
330b1('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
330b2('bum): phyi nad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
330b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
330b4('bum): pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
330b5('bum): pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong po nyid dang / dngos po mye da pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
330b6('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
330b7('bum): dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gan+da
330b8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang /
331a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
331a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan da// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par che ba dag kyang bstand te/
331a3('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i
331a4('bum): chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /
331a5('bum): bkur bstir bya ba dang phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa ra bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun su ma tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom
331a6('bum): ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par gyi 'gyur ro// 'jug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed
331a7('bum): ba'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed
331a8('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon
331b1('bum): bar 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstand to// sems dang po
331b2('bum): bskyed pa nas sems bcu bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
331b3('bum): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
331b4('bum): nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du/ pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
331b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
331b6('bum): pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
331b7('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i
331b8('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
332a1('bum): dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
332a2('bum): dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
332a3('bum): pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par le ba dag kyang bstand te/ des na byang chub sems
332a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i
332a5('bum): chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya/
332a6('bum): ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
332a7('bum): de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur du gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed
332a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa myed
332b1('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
332b2('bum): shing khyung zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstand to// sem
332b3('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
332b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phye nad pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid
332b5('bum): dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
332b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
332b7('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngos
332b8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
333a1('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
333a2('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang /
333a3('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
333a4('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chu pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par
333a5('bum): shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstanate/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye
333a6('bum): bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
333a7('bum): gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phur sum tshogs par 'gyu'o
333a8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par
333b1('bum): bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad
333b2('bum): pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa'i dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad
333b3('bum): las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu drug pa'o//
333b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po ma gcig pa// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du
333b5('bum): sems par gyur te/ gnas btan rab 'byor kyis de ltar chos kyi char pa 'di yab ste bstan na de la bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog mngon
333b6('bum): bar sprul pa bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor da la gtor
333b7('bum): bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu pa
334a1('bum): gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs
334a2('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gyi lha dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad
334a3('bum): myed dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / myi che ba'i lha dang / myi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i
334a4('bum): lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og myin gyi lho dza/ snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor da kyis chos kyi char pa 'di phab
334a5('bum): ste bstan na/ de la bdag cag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog mngon par sprul pa bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang
334a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor da la gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam
334a7('bum): mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gi lA dang / mche ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan
334a8('bum): byi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lnga nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kum 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lnga dang / snang po'i
334b1('bum): lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad myed dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i
334b2('bum): lha dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / kye che ba'i lha dang / myi gdung ba'i lha dang / shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og myin gyi lha de dag thams
334b3('bum): cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ma 'da' ra ba mang po mngon par sprul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'
334b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong kyi dge 'a dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor da la 'thor bar gyu rad to// mngon par 'khor bar gyurd to// rab tu yer/
334b5('bum): bar gyurd to// me tog de dag gis gtor da ma thag/ tu steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhi me tog gis khengs par gyurang nas/ steng gi bar snang la
334b6('bum): yang me tog gi khang pa bamigs pa steng gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun nas gnas par gyur to// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor nga 'di snyam
334b7('bum): du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor pa'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngan cad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o//
334b8('bum): 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor nga ba'i me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin/ chu las skyes pa ma yin/ thang las skyes pa ma yin no// 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon
335a1('bum): par gtor nga ba'i me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor nga la 'di
335a2('bum): skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor da me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ma yin no// sum bu las byung ba ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras
335a3('bum): 5ke'u shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag yid las byung ba ma yin/ ldum bu las byung ba ma yin re zhes zer ba ni/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ma skyes pa ni
335a4('bum): me tog kyang ma yin no/ brgya byin kyis smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor da mo tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar zadadam/ 'ond tam gzugs kyang ma byang / tshor ba
335a5('bum): yang ma byung / 'du shes kyang ma byung / 'du byed kyang ma byung / rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba // rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka me te/ 'di dag nyi
335a6('bum): ma byung bar ma zad kyi ke'u shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no// ke'u shi ka tshor ba yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no//
335a7('bum): ke'u shi ka 'du shes kyang ma byang ba ste/ kang ma zung ba de ni 'du shes ma yin no// ke'u shi ka 'du byed kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa yang ma
335a8('bum): byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka myig ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni myig ma yin no// ke'u shi ka na ba ni mabyung ba ste/ kang ma byung ba de mi
335b1('bum): ma yin no/ ke'u shaM ka sA ni ma brang ba ste/ gang ma brung ba de ni sA ma yin no// ke'u sha~M ka l+ye ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lus ni ma byung ba ste/ kang ma byung ba de ni lus ma
335b2('bum): yin no// ke'u shika yid ni ma zung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/ kang ma phyung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sgra nis byung ba ste/
335b3('bum): kang ma bung ba de ni sgra ma yin de/ ke'u shi ka dri ni ma byung ba ste/ kang la byung ba de ni dri ma yin no// ke'u shi ka re na ma bung ba ste/ gang mabyung ba de ni ro ma yin no// ke'u shaM ka re ka ni ma byung ba
335b4('bum): ste/ gang ma brang ba de ni reg ma yin no// ke'u shi ka chos ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chos ma yin no// ke'u shi ka myig gi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang
